column1: Furthermore, it was the submission of the learned President’s Counsel for the Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner
that the Controller of Exchange was a party to the ac(cid:415)on and had this issue been raised
before  the  High  Court,  a  sa(cid:415)sfactory  explana(cid:415)on  could  have  been  oﬀered  by  the
Controller of Exchange or by one or more of the other par(cid:415)es as to the legality of whether
the Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner can hold 999,998. However,  this was not  to  be  due  to  the  failure  of  the
Respondents to raise this issue before the High Court.
